html:
{%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%}
MONEY RECEIPT
MR. No. {{ doc.name}}
Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.nowdate()) }}

Received with thanks from {{ doc.pay_to_recd_from or doc.party }}, the sum of Ngultrum ({{ (frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.actual_receivable_amount or doc.base_received_amount))[3:] }}) by Cash/Draft/Cheque No. {{ doc.reference_no }} dated {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.reference_date) }} in payment for {{ doc.remarks }}

Nu. {{ doc.get_formatted("actual_receivable_amount", doc) or doc.get_formatted("base_received_amount") }}
{{doc.company}}
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format('', '') }}

This print is system generated and should be considered VALID only with appropriate seal and/or signature.
Printed by {{ frappe.user }} on {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }} at {{ frappe.utils.nowtime() }}
name: Money Receipts
